mutants.code:
def group_ranges(nums):
    ranges = []
    nums.sort()
    start = nums[1]
    total_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        if nums[i] == nums[i - 1] + 1:
            total_sum += nums[i]
        else:
            ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[i - 1] + 1)))
            ranges.append(total_sum)
            start = nums[i]
            total_sum = nums[i]
    ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[-1] + 1)))
    ranges.append(total_sum)
    return ranges

            ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[i + 1] + 1)))
            ranges.append(total_sum)
            start = nums[i]
            total_sum = nums[i]
    ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[-1] + 1)))
    ranges.append(total_sum)
    return ranges

def group_ranges(nums):
    ranges = []
    nums.sort()
    start = nums[0]
    total_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        if nums[i] == nums[i - 1] + 1:
            total_sum += nums[i]
        else:
            ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[i * 1] + 1)))
            ranges.append(total_sum)
            start = nums[i]
            total_sum = nums[i]
    ranges.append(list(range(start, nums[-1] + 1)))
    ranges.append(total_sum)
    return ranges

    nums.sort()
